PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-10692023-10-27ESDC, TB
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectSupplemental Benefits Received by Three Governor in Council Appointees Within the Department of Employment and Social Development Remission Order
PrecisSUPPLEMENTAL BENEFITS RECEIVED BY THREE GOVERNOR IN COUNCIL APPOINTEES WITHIN THE DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT AND SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT REMISSION ORDER in order to remit the debts unknowingly incurred by two full-time appointees to the National Advisory Council on Poverty and by the full-time Chief Accessibility Officer as a result of administrative error and oversight.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Supplemental Benefits Received by Three Governor in Council Appointees Within the Department of Employment and Social Development Remission Order
precis: SUPPLEMENTAL BENEFITS RECEIVED BY THREE GOVERNOR IN COUNCIL APPOINTEES WITHIN THE DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT AND SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT REMISSION ORDER in order to remit the debts unknowingly incurred by two full-time appointees to the National Advisory Council on Poverty and by the full-time Chief Accessibility Officer as a result of administrative error and oversight.
